# Get the output of the ML model
```{r}
# Complete Set
# existingExperimentList <- NULL # comment out if running with same layer and cancer combination as last run
# modelOutput <- standardizedModelBuilding(c("methylation", "RNAseq", "miRNA"), cancerName="HNSC", existingExperimentList=existingExperimentList)

# Holdouts
modelOutput <- standardizedModelBuilding(c("RNAseq"), cancerName="HNSC", methodNames=c("glmnet"), splitSize=0.99, seed=47, existingExperimentsList=existingExperimentList, iterationCount=1, applyBiasCorrection=TRUE)
existingExperimentList <- modelOutput$experimentList
```


# Survival analysis given model just ran
```{r}
stats <- getSurvivalStats(modelOutput$experimentList[[1]], modelOutput$ModelBuilding$predicted, applyBiasCorrection=FALSE)
# stats <- getSurvivalStats(modelOutput$experimentList[[1]], modelOutput$ModelBuilding$predicted, applyBiasCorrection=TRUE)
print(summary(stats$interaction_model))
```

# Survival analysis given previous data
```{r}
results <- read.csv("/restricted/projectnb/agedisease/projects/pancancer_aging_clocks/results/ElasticNet_HNSC_HPV_Negative/ElasticNetRNAseqCompleteSet.csv")
```
